Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people communicating over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a device using sound to send or receive information.
The student can show that their device connects the two people (e.g., with string or wire).
The student can demonstrate, through their drawing, the device working over the given distance.
The student can include details that show the use of sound in the device (like vibrations).
The student can depict only the materials provided in the drawing for their device.
The student can draw features that meet the required aspects of the design solution (such as size or length of string).
